summary: Run an externally hosted UDF container
description: Runs a compatible UDF container that is either externally hosted by a service provider or running on a local machine of the user. The UDF container must follow the [openEO UDF specification](https://open-eo.github.io/openeo-udf/). See ``run_udf()`` for more information on usage and options.

url.description: URL to a remote UDF service.

options.description: Options that should be passed to the UDF.

returns.description: The data processed by the UDF service.
